titleStmt.title: A sermon preached on Sundaye, being the .17. of March Anno. 1577. at S. Alpheges Church within Creplegate in London, by William Fulke doctor in diuinitie. Seene and allowed, accordyng to the order appoynted in the Queenes Maiesties Iniunctions
titleStmt.author: Fulke, William, 1538-1589.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By T. Dawson and T. Gardiner] for Lucas Harryson,

notesStmt.note: Printers' names from STC; publication date from colophon.
Running title reads: A learned and fruitful sermon preached by D. Fulke.
